Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Priority valve malfunction. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Steering Control component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 04/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
